title: Table 167 - Row 17
clause_text: Whether area for inclusive housing is required as per Regulation No.3.8 ? Please state the details.: (b) If so, is fire escape staircase provided in addition to regular staircase? | : Yes / No | : Yes / No | : Yes / No | : Yes / No | : Yes / No | : Yes / No | : Yes / No
